subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Young and brash Alpine racers like Mikaela Shiffrin and Lara Gut are challenging established skiers including Maria Höfl-Riesch and Marlies Schild.
snippet: Young and brash Alpine racers like Mikaela Shiffrin and Lara Gut are challenging established skiers including Maria Höfl-Riesch and Marlies Schild.
